jathika pasalak nam ema thiranaya jathika pasal adhyakshawaraya wetha danumdiya yuthu bawayi adhyapana amathyanshaya kiya sitiye.emenma, wipathata pathwu pasal daruwan pilibanda warthawak haki ikmanin sakas kara thaman wetha labadena lesa adhyapana amathya akila wiraj kariyawasam niladharinta upades labadi thibenawa.

aar.ge winashakari mawatha thora ganimin sitina bawa pahadili lesama penennata thibe. 1989di dakune tharuna nangitima leyin saha yakadin mardanaya kirimen anathuruwa janadhipathi premadasa mahacharya gamini lakshman pirisge sabhapathithwayen path kala ‘tharuna asahana janadhipathi komisame’ nirdesha matha mathiwarana nithiya sanshodhanaya karamin, tharunayan saha kuda paksha sandaha parlimenthuwe idak laba dima wenuwen asunak sandaha laba gatha yuthu awama chanda prathishathaya 5%k dakwa adu karana ladi.
dan eeken pana giyath janadhipathithumata chande dena jathiye game bayiyek thoraganna.
loke gas awashyathawen siyata 77 sapayanna 2010 owun samath wela thiyanawa.
